Ã‚Â²     moneyGuru is a personal finance management application. With it,      Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     you can evaluate your financial situation so you can make             Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     informed (and thus better) decisions. Most finance applications       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     have the same goal, but moneyGuru's difference is in the way it       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     achieves it. Rather than having reports which you have to             Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     configure (or find out which pre-configured report is the right       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     one), your important financial data (net worth, profit) is            Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     constantly up-to-date and "in your face". This allows you to          Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     constantly make informed decision rather than doing so                Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     periodically.                                                         Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²                                                                           Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     Get it done right. moneyGuru is loosely based on the double-entry     Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     accounting system, where every account - including income and         Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     expenses - is a first class account, not just a category. It          Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     allows for a lot of flexibility in finance management strategies      Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     (such as cash management).                                            Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²                                                                           Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     Get it done fast. moneyGuru has a very efficient navigation and       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     editing system which allows you to painlessly go around your          Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     accounts and transactions and modify them. Keyboard shortcuts are     Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     neatly designed and efficient. Values are auto-completed when it      Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     makes sense. Date editing uses a special widget that lets you         Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     edit dates with the least possible number of keystrokes,              Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     regardless of your date format.                                       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²                                                                           Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     Get it in there. moneyGuru can import QIF, OFX, QFX and CSV files     Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     and can export to QIF.                                                Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²                                                                           Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     Get international. moneyGuru's support for currencies is way          Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     ahead all competitors. While other applications that bother with      Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     currencies at all do it half-heartedly with poorly thought out        Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     designs, currencies are at the core of moneyGuru's design.            Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²                                                                           Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     See it coming. moneyGuru is future aware. Select a date range         Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     that ends in the future, and see, through the sheets and charts,      Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ã‚Â²     how scheduled transactions and budgeting will affect your finance.    Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
